name: Out of Fuel
description:
Out of Fuel is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in control of a powerful chainsaw as you work to completely destroy various objects. But there's a catch – your chainsaw consumes gasoline at a rapid pace, so you must collect as many coins as possible to upgrade your saw and keep it fueled up for as long as possible.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter a variety of objects that need to be destroyed. Each object requires a different amount of fuel and skill to destroy, so you'll need to use strategy and quick reflexes to succeed.
Collecting coins allows you to upgrade your chainsaw and make it more powerful, allowing you to destroy even larger objects with ease. You can also use your coins to purchase additional fuel, so you never run out in the middle of an important task.

Out of Fuel is a game that encourages creativity and experimentation, as you discover new ways to destroy objects and collect more coins. With its addictive gameplay and stunning graphics, this game is sure to keep you entertained for hours on end. So grab your chainsaw and get ready to take on the challenge!

Game Features :
- Collecting coins
- Destroying big objects
- Upgrading the chainsaw
